amendment.description: To provide a fiscally responsible open enrollment authority.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3467 withdrawn in Senate.
Senate vitiated previous adoption of Amendment SA 3467.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3467 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3467 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 3315. (consideration: CR S7134; text: CR S7134) To provide a fiscally responsible open enrollment authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3467 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3467 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 3315.
